thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 58 of 1961
thread.title: Steve

author: Steve
title: Steve
text:
First time using this service and based on this experience it won't be the last.
Exceptional value for money coupled with excellent service and the convenience of having the work done at my home address at a time and date that's convenient for me.. well what more could you ask for.
Highly rated in terms of communications from placing the order to the technician turning up (who was actually slightly earlier). Technician was also really friendly and explained fully everything he was doing.
Paid for the work via chip and pin when the job had been completed too, wasn't made to pay up front.
Genuinely 5 star ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Plus. Thank you.
